CDFglobalAttributes.Project: STSP Cluster>Solar Terrestrial Science Programmes, Cluster
CDFglobalAttributes.TEXT:
Electron Drift Instrument
Electric field measured by the drift velocity 
of monoenergetic artificial electron beams 
injected perpendicularly to the ambient magnetic field
CDFglobalAttributes.Logical_source_description: Electron Drift Velocity and Electric Field, spin resolution
CDFglobalAttributes.MISSION_DESCRIPTION:
The aim of the Cluster mission is to study small-scale structures of the magnetosphere 
and its environment in three dimensions. To achieve this, Cluster is constituted of four 
identical spacecraft that will flight in a tetrahedral configuration. The separation distances 
between the spacecraft will be varied between ~3 km and 67 000 km, according to the 
key scientific regions.
CDFglobalAttributes.MISSION_REFERENCES: The Cluster and Phoenix Missions>Cluster project and instrument teams>Space Sci. Rev. 79, Nos. 1-2, 1997

CDFglobalAttributes.EXPERIMENT_CAVEATS:
EDI experiment is operated in 2 modes 'Electric Field'
and 'Ambient Electron' mode, see instrument mode dataset (C[1-3]_CQ_EDI_CLIST) for
specific time intervals
Large data gaps may occur due to: 
- highly variable magnetic and/or electric fields
- high ambient electron fluxes
- radiation induced hardware failures
Smaller data gaps occur in MCP calibration mode or 
at regularly scheduled BM3 dumps
Data availability in 'Electric field' mode is documented
in the QSTAT files with 10 min resolution

CDFglobalAttributes.DATASET_TITLE: Electron Drift Velocity and Electric Field, spin resolution
CDFglobalAttributes.DATASET_DESCRIPTION:
This dataset contains spin resolution measurements of the
electron drift velocity and electric field with GOOD/CAUTION qualities
from the EDI experiment on the Cluster C3 spacecraft.
These data have been converted into Cluster Exchange Format from the orignal
Cluster Science Data System Common Data Format (CDF) Prime Parameter files
that were made available through the Cluster Science Data System.
The SPIN dataset is identical to the PP dataset but without chi_squared variable.
CDFglobalAttributes.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the EDI team and ESA Cluster Active Archive in any publication based upon use of this data

VarAttributes.CATDESC: Electron Drift Velocity, spin resolution in GSE
VarAttributes.FIELDNAM: Electron Drift Velocity, spin resolution in GSE
VarAttributes.VAR_NOTES: The quality of the data is in status byte 0. Other options to filter are in bytes 3,5,6. More information can be found in UG(p.8) and ICD documents.

VarAttributes.CATDESC: Electric Field, spin resolution in GSE
VarAttributes.FIELDNAM: Electric Field, spin resolution in GSE
VarAttributes.VAR_NOTES: The quality of the data is in status byte 0. Other options to filter are in bytes 3,5,6. More information can be found in UG(p.8) and ICD documents.
